ghosts.name: Spirit
ghosts.strength: The Spirit has no unique powers
ghosts.weakness: Using Smudge Sticks on a Spirit will stop it attacking for twice as long as other types of Ghost.

ghosts.name: Goryo
ghosts.strength: A Goryo will usually only show itself on camera if there are no people nearby.
ghosts.weakness: They are rarely seen far from their place of death.

ghosts.name: Yokai
ghosts.strength: Talking near a Yokai will anger it and cause it to attack more often.
ghosts.weakness: While hunting, it can only hear voices close to it.

ghosts.name: Wraith
ghosts.strength: The Wraith can travel through walls and doors without opening them, and will not leave footprints on the ground.
ghosts.weakness: If a Wraith comes into contact with a pile of salt, it will immediately cease attacking.

ghosts.name: Phantom
ghosts.strength: Looking at a Phantom will considerably drop your Sanity.
ghosts.weakness: Taking a photo of the Phantom will make it temporarily disappear.

ghosts.name: Poltergeist
ghosts.strength: A Poltergeist can throw huge amounts of objects at once.
ghosts.weakness: A Poltergeist is almost ineffective in an empty room.

ghosts.name: Banshee
ghosts.strength: A Banshee will focus on one player at a time until it kills them.

ghosts.name: Jinn
ghosts.strength: A Jinn will travel at a faster speed if its victim is far away.
ghosts.weakness: Turning off the location's power source will prevent the Jinn from using its ability.

ghosts.name: Mare
ghosts.strength: Increased chance to attack in the dark.
ghosts.weakness: Turning the lights on will lower its chance to attack.

ghosts.name: Myling
ghosts.strength: A Myling is known to be quieter when hunting.
ghosts.weakness: Mylings more frequently make paranormal sounds.

ghosts.name: Revenant
ghosts.strength: A Revenant will travel at a significantly faster speed when hunting a victim.
ghosts.weakness: Hiding from the Revenant will cause it to move very slowly.

ghosts.name: Shade
ghosts.strength: A Shade will rarely perform actions in the presence of two or more people
ghosts.weakness: A Shade will rarely start a Hunt when players are grouped together.

ghosts.name: Demon
ghosts.strength: Demons will attack more often than any other Ghost.
ghosts.weakness: Asking a Demon successful questions on the Ouija Board won't lower the users' sanity.

ghosts.name: Yurei
ghosts.strength: Yurei have been known to have a stronger effect on people's sanity.
ghosts.weakness: Using Smudge Sticks on the Yurei's room will cause it to not wander around the location for a long time.

ghosts.name: Oni
ghosts.strength: Oni are more active when people are nearby and have been seen moving objects at great speed.
ghosts.weakness: Being more active will make the Oni easier to find and identify.
